subject: file & path check: add /run and /run/lock
commitMessage:
file & path check: add /run and /run/lock

These places are specified by systemd. /run is intended to take /var/run
role (which should be symlink to run) as a place for runtime data.
/run/lock should take role of /var/lock (which is symlink to /run/lock).

More detailed information:
http://www.freedesktop.org/software/systemd/man/file-hierarchy.html
http://cgit.freedesktop.org/systemd/systemd/tree/tmpfiles.d/legacy.conf

Change-Id: I3d08b910cd1a48cd0a67b0df14a6e548735559a4
Signed-off-by: Maciej Wereski <m.wereski@partner.samsung.com>
